posts.post_content:
Every once it a while it's time to sell off something good....so here we go....
T206 Young PSA5 Tolstoi - $2500 (this card has close to NM corners!!) SOLD
T206 Mullin SGC 40/3 UZIT - $2500.

Best,
Scott
Scott...r those prices correct?  Same price for a uzit and a tolstoi?

[quote name="scottglevy" post=911995]
T206 Young PSA5 Tolstoi - $2500 (this card has close to NM corners!!)

Best,
Scott[/QUOTE]

I hurt my neck trying to see what dropped it to EX if the corners are close to NM, can you tell us?

Only the same price BC the tolstoi is of Cy Young :)

The Young probably got a '5' bc of some surface scratching.  I did think that it had a real shot at a '6' or a '6.5' though.

Best,
Scott

Thanks Trae....that was very cool of you to do.
P.S. The young is sold - thanks!
